decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing Cloudpost lands to ramp up mana quickly in order to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Ulamog and Emrakul. The deck also uses various spells and artifacts to disrupt the opponent's strategy and protect its own creatures. By using cards like Crop Rotation and Karn, the Great Creator to search for specific lands or artifacts, the deck aims to establish a dominant board presence and overwhelm the opponent with its powerful creatures and disruptive spells.

This aggro Death & Taxes deck focuses on utilizing various creatures with disruptive abilities to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By using cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben, Skyclave Apparition, and Flickerwisp to hinder the opponent's resources, combined with Aether Vial for mana acceleration and Stoneforge Mystic to fetch powerful equipment like Kaldra Compleat, the deck aims to pressure the opponent while maintaining control of the game. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion adds value and versatility to the deck's strategy by providing additional card advantage and synergy with its blink effects.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through card advantage, countering spells, and removing threats. It utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Tamiyo and Jace, along with versatile cards like Snapcaster Mage and Force of Will. The deck aims to stabilize with removal like Swords to Plowshares and board wipes like Terminus, while generating card advantage with cards like Scroll Rack and Consign to Memory. The win condition is often through overwhelming the opponent with angels from Entreat the Angels or locking them out with Counterbalance. The deck also includes some extra versatility with cards like Time Warp and Prismatic Ending.
